alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Chester; Western Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:18AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Castle, southwestern Chester and southwestern Delaware Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 918 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homeville, or 12 miles south of New Holland, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Newark, Elsmere, Kennett Square, New Castle, Oxford, Parkesburg, West Grove, Newport, Arden, Homeville, Cochranville, Stanton, North Star, Glasgow, Bear, Talleyville, Wilmington Manor, Elam and Mount Vernon. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 0 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
